name: Train to Eureka
description:
Betrayed by the people closest to her, Leah makes the decision to travel across a continent to make a new life. Along for the ride is a woman at the lowest point in her life, Catherine. Together they will travel on freight trains across the Canadian wilderness!

But not everyone riding the rails is going to be friendly. The women will need to work together and trust each other to survive. Especially when they encounter a man with a dark past he's trying to leave behind.

Join the trio on an adventure to the west coast. Filled with deception, betrayal, drama, and bravery!

  • A dramatic story
  • Multiple endings
  • Includes themes of betrayal, forgiveness, and trust
  • Featuring LGBT characters
  • And of course: trains!
